name: Ogre Flesh Heap
description: A large reanimated hulk formed from the remains of an ogre, the Ogre Flesh Heap exhibits a powerful physique with a grotesque and imposing appearance.
memorable: Its Undead Fortitude allows it to cheat death, making it a resilient foe able to withstand significant damage.
goals: Typically aims to crush foes in melee combat, leveraging its resilience and brute strength.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other undead creatures or as a minion of a necromancer.
environment: Commonly found in battlefields, graveyards, or areas of necromantic activity.
strengths: Exceptionally high strength and constitution, allowing it to deal considerable damage and sustain hits.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence, leading to poor initiative and limited cunning in combat.
attacks: Uses its Greatclub to deliver crushing blows, employs a Sweeping Strike to affect multiple foes, and can grapple enemies with Grab.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows it to stay standing when it should fall, unless struck by radiant damage or a critical hit.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enabling it to see in low-light conditions.
skills: Has very low passive perception, making it somewhat unaware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Immunities to poison damage and fatigue effects.
Can regain hit points through its Bite attack when grappling enemies.
Ability to unleash acid damage with Corpulent Expulsion.
Grappling a creature prevents it from escaping unless successful.
Can push opponents away with its Sweeping Strike.
test_queries: brutal undead creature with undead fortitude
undead ogre crushing enemies in combat
